Description:
 When executing "Run Validation" for XML Example "Editing and Validating XML
 File", the operation failed with Java MissingResourceException on Japanese 
 Windows. The Exception should be avaoided with English resources, even if 
 the currrent build doesn't provide Japanese resource yet. 
 
?Build date: org.eclipse.wst (1.0.1.200603021731)
             wtp-sdk-S-1.5M5-200603022222.zip

?OS: Windows XP Japanese SP2

 Steps to recreate problem:
??????? 1- Create new XML example (Fike -> New -> Example,  
           XML - > "Editing and Validating XML File") 
??????? 2- Select Invoice.dtd file as example
??????? 3- Right click and execute "Add Validation"
           After a while, the exception occured, and 
           3 error messages are detected.   
           However, 2 of them cannot be displayed correctly with the blank.

Exception Log:

Vijau, assigning to you, i have fixed the resource exception part, 
but  Connector validator shouldn't even shown up in the list of available
validators for the projects  which dont have  correct facet defined.
The problem is no longer recreatable with Eclipse 3.2 I20060401
